name: AchievoATK
short_description:
Achievo is an extensible web-based resource management application for business environments. Achievo enables organizations to support their business processes simply and effectively, including rich core functionality and supporting Add-On modules for new functionality. Achievo is also the reference application for the ATK framework. Achievo is licensed under the terms of the GNU General Public License v2.

The ATK (Achievo ToolKit) framework is an object-oriented full-stack PHP framework for developing business-oriented web applications, such as HRM, CRM, data management and CMS type applications. ATK allows developers to focus on business logic, instead of coding HTML and CSS. ATK is licensed under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License v3.

Achievo and ATK were created by iBuildings, and are now being supported by the community. New development based on ATK is being done in the Sourceforge Adapto project.
summary: Resource management web app and framework
